title: Realme C85: World record-breaking “ultra waterproof” phone, but not for the reason you think
description: Realme has just launched a new budget-oriented mid-range smartphone in Malaysia, the Realme C85 5G. What’s interesting, though, is that the phone just earned itself a title in the Guinness World Records. Realme C85 sets water resistance world record with 280 …
